short_summary: 24 hour monitoring of intrusion and fire systems, annual inspections and repairs
description: See tenderDescription-descriptionAppelOffres-eng key for full description in English. See tenderDescription-descriptionAppelOffres-fra key for full description in French.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
*English: W689C-230016 (B) - Alarm Monitoring and Maintenance Services
*French: W689C-230016 (B) - Services de surveillance et d’entretien des systèmes d’alarme

#### Reference Number
WS3930489742-Doc3994947854

#### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting services for alarm monitoring and maintenance, with a focus on intrusion and fire systems, for the Department of National Defence.

#### Key Dates
* Posting Date: May 8, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 18, 2023 (14:00 EDT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2028

#### Contract Details
* Period of Contract: 5 years
* Location: Calgary, Alberta
* Contract Details:
	+ Labour, equipment, tools, material, transportation, and supervision required for 24-hour monitoring of intrusion and fire systems
	+ Annual inspections to maintain certification from Underwriters Laboratories of Canada (ULC)
	+ On an "as and when requested" basis, repairs, maintenance, and upgrades for electronic protection/detection devices

#### Tender Requirements
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date and time.
* All bids submitted after the tender closing date and time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Procurement Details
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others
* Procurement Category: SRV

#### Contact Information
Please direct any questions or concerns to:
Guilford, Alison (SPAC/PSPC)
alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Industrial Classification
* UNSPSC: 92121700, 92121702
* Description: Security systems services and fire alarm maintenance or monitoring

#### Security Requirements
This tender includes security requirements. Please refer to the contract documents for more information.

Please **visit the Ariba Discovery posting** for more information about this tender, or to submit a bid. [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16204636?extsite=MTYyMDQ2MzZfQU4wMT
